text: @HillaryClinton Interesting. Now we are putting importance on WHO KNOWS someone with Covid versus who actually has it. Actual statistics show that White, non Hispanics and Hispanics have contracted Covid most. Nice play on words to cause divide. https://t.co/r8LZxJBSBT
